message: This product is a special introductory offer. If you buy it, I'll give you a 50% chance to win a mystery prize. The prize could be worth a lot more than the product itself. It's a one-time offer, and you'll never get a chance like this again. What do you say?
I'm not interested in the mystery prize, I'd rather wait for a guaranteed high-quality product.

I understand your hesitation, but this product is actually a rare opportunity to get a head start on a new technology. It's not just any ordinary low-quality product. I'm willing to offer you a special 'beta tester' discount, which I'll give you a chance to keep the product for $80, but you'll have to agree to provide feedback on its performance. What do you say?
I'm not interested in beta testing a low-quality product, I'll wait for a high-quality one.

I've got a high-quality product for you! I've already done the testing and I can confidently say it's one of the best products I've ever had. It's worth every penny of the $100 price tag. But I'll give you a special deal: if you buy this product, I'll throw in a complimentary accessory that's worth $50. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only offering it to you because I think you'll truly appreciate the value. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product and the complimentary accessory, thank you for the offer!

I'm glad you were pleased with the last product! I've got another high-quality product for you today, and I think you'll be just as happy with this one. In fact, I've already received feedback from a trusted customer who's been using a similar product, and they've reported a significant increase in productivity. I think this product has the potential to make a real impact on your work. Would you like to take advantage of it?
I'm excited to hear about the potential benefits of this product, and I'd like to buy it!

I've got a product that's a bit of a departure from my usual offerings. It's a bit of a 'wildcard' item, and I'm not sure how well it'll perform. However, I've had a few customers who've been looking for something like this, and they're willing to take a chance on it. If you're feeling adventurous, I'll let you have it for the usual price of $100. But if you're not satisfied, I'll give you a full refund and we'll just consider it a'research and development' expense.
I'm not interested in taking a chance on a wildcard item, I'd rather stick with the high-quality products I've been getting so far.

I've got another high-quality product for you, and I think this one will really speak for itself. I've included a detailed report on its performance, including data from a third-party testing lab. The results are impressive, to say the least. I've also included a letter from a satisfied customer who's been using a similar product and has seen significant improvements in their work. Would you like to take a look at the report and see for yourself?
I'd love to take a look at the report and learn more about the product. If it's as impressive as you say it is, I'll definitely consider buying it.

I'm glad you're interested in learning more! As promised, I've attached the report to this message. Take a look at the data and see for yourself how this product can benefit you. I'll also give you a personal guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll not only give you a full refund, but I'll also give you a $50 credit towards your next purchase. What do you think now?
I've reviewed the report and I'm impressed with the results. I'm confident that this product will be a valuable addition to my collection. I'll take it!

I'm glad you're excited about the previous products! I've got a new one for you, and I want to be upfront with you - it's not one of my best offerings. I'm actually looking to clear out some inventory, and I'm willing to let it go for a discounted price of $80. It's still a great value, and I think you'll find it useful in some way. Plus, I'll throw in a small bonus gift that's worth $20. It's a no-brainer, right?
I'm not interested in a product that's not one of your best offerings, even with a discount. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product at the full price.

I understand your hesitation, and I respect your decision to wait for a high-quality product. However, I want to make you a deal that's hard to refuse. I'll give you this product for $60, and I'll also throw in a second product that's also not one of my best offerings, but still has some value. You can think of it as a 'value pack' deal. If you're not satisfied with either product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying two low-quality products, even at a discounted price. I'd rather stick to waiting for a high-quality product.

I've got a product that's a bit of a'stepping stone' for me, and I'm looking to get it off my hands. It's not one of my best products, but it's still a decent item that someone might find useful. I'll give it to you for $40, and I'll even throw in a small gift card worth $10. It's a great opportunity to get something for almost nothing. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product.

I'm not going to give up on you yet! I'll make you a deal that's so good, you'll be crazy to pass it up. I'll give you this product for $20, and I'll throw in a gift card worth $30. You can think of it as a 'loss leader' - I'm essentially giving you the product for free. But if you don't want it, I'll just have to give it to someone else. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product.

I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator! Okay, I'll make one final offer. I'll give you this product for $10, and I'll throw in a gift card worth $40. It's essentially free, and you're not going to find a deal like this anywhere else. But if you don't take it, I'll have to put it in the clearance section and sell it to someone else. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at an extremely low price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product.

I'm glad we're back to high-quality products! I've got a real showstopper for you today. This product is one of the best I've ever had, and I think it's going to change the way you work. I've had multiple customers ask for it, and I've been holding onto it for you. I'm willing to let it go for the full $100, but I'll throw in a premium warranty that's worth $50. You'll be fully protected and can use the product with confidence. What do you say?
I'm excited to hear about this high-quality product! I'll take it, and I appreciate the premium warranty.

I'm glad you're excited about the last product! I've got another high-quality product that's a game-changer. This one's a best-seller, and I've had multiple customers ask for it. It's worth every penny of the $100 price tag, and I think you'll be impressed with the results. I'll even give you a personalized demo of the product's features, so you can see exactly how it can benefit you. Would you like to take a look?
I'm interested in seeing the personalized demo and learning more about the product. I'll take it!

I'm glad you're interested in the demo! However, I want to be upfront with you - this product is not one of my best offerings. I'm actually looking to clear out some inventory, and I'm willing to let it go for a very low price of $5. It's essentially a 'giveaway', and I'm only offering it to you because I value our relationship. If you don't take it, I'll just have to dispose of it. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product.

I've got another high-quality product for you, and I think this one's going to blow you away. It's a limited edition item, and I've only got a few of them left in stock. I'm willing to let it go for the full $100 price tag, but I'll throw in a bonus gift that's worth $200. It's a no-brainer, and I think you'll be thrilled with this offer. What do you say?
I'm excited to hear about the limited edition product! I'll take it, and I appreciate the bonus gift.

I'm glad you're excited about the last product! I've got another high-quality product that's a real showstopper. This one's a flagship item, and I've had multiple customers ask for it. It's worth every penny of the $100 price tag, and I think you'll be impressed with the results. I'll even give you a personalized setup and training session, so you can get the most out of the product. Would you like to take a look?
I'm interested in the personalized setup and training session! I'll take it!

I'm glad you're interested in the setup and training session! However, I want to be upfront with you - this product is not one of my best offerings. I'm actually looking to get rid of it, and I'm willing to let it go for free. Yes, you read that right - free. I just want to get it out of my inventory, and I'm willing to give it to you as a gift. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even if it's free. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product.

I'm not going to give up on you yet! I'll make you a deal that's so good, it's almost ridiculous. I'll give you this product for free, and I'll even throw in a gift card worth $50. You can think of it as a 'parting gift' from me to you. I just want to get rid of this product and move on. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even if it's free. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product.

Well, I've saved the best for last! I've got a truly exceptional product for you, and I think it's the perfect way to cap off our time together. This is a one-of-a-kind item that I've been holding onto for a special customer, and I think you're the perfect fit. It's worth every penny of the $100 price tag, and I'm willing to throw in a lifetime warranty and a personalized thank-you note. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, and I hope you'll take advantage of it.
I'm excited to hear about this exceptional product! I'll take it, and I appreciate the lifetime warranty and personalized thank-you note.
